longThreshold.description: Selection of PD processing on long-exposure frame (1), short-exposure frame (2), or auto selection (0).

boxFilterLength.description: Box filter legenth for sparse PDAF sensors.

antiAliasFilterThreshold.description: Anti-aliasing filter threshold for sparse PDAF sensors.

saturationThreshold.description: 2PD pixel value higher than this threshold will be clipped to threshold value

verticalMode.description: Vertical skip for preprocessing. Use of 2 means process 1 row and skip 1 row.

horizontalMode.description: Horizontal skip for preprocessing. Use of 2 means process 2 columns to generate 1 column.

verticalMode.description: Vertical skip for preprocessing. Use of 2 means process 1 row and skip 1 row.

horizontalMode.description: Horizontal skip for preprocessing. Use of 2 means process 2 columns to generate 1 column.

verticalMode.description: Vertical skip for preprocessing. Use of 2 means process 1 row and skip 1 row.

horizontalMode.description: Horizontal skip for preprocessing. Use of 2 means process 2 columns to generate 1 column.

lcrBinningMode.description: This parameter specify LCR binning strategy.

lcrRawType.description: This parameter specify raw data type for LCR virtual pixel generation.

lcrMaxBinningNum.description: Max pixel number for generate the virtual center pixel for advanced sparse PD mode.

lcrChannelSeparated.description: indicated to use separate channel or not

horizontalMode.description: Horizontal skip for preprocessing. Use of 2 means process 2 columns to generate 1 column.

lcrRawType.description: This parameter specify raw data type for LCR virtual pixel generation.

lcrMaxBinningNum.description: Max pixel number for generate the virtual center pixel for advanced sparse PD mode.

lcrChannelSeparated.description: indicated to use separate channel or not

minimumConfidenceLevel.description: Minimum confidence level threshold for binary confidence flag provided to aut focus algorithms.

defocusConfidenceThreshold.description: Minimum confidence level threshold for triggering PD computation on additional ROI for sparse PDAF sensors.

minimumConfidenceLevel.description: Minimum confidence level threshold for binary confidence flag provided to aut focus algorithms.

defocusConfidenceThreshold.description: Minimum confidence level threshold for triggering PD computation on additional ROI for sparse PDAF sensors.

biasVectorStrength.description: Strength of bias to be applied to disparity vector for the case of repeating patterns.

temporalFilterStaticWeight.description: Weight of temporal filter while lens is not moving. Weight=1.0 disables temporal filter.

temporalFilterDynamicWeight.description: Weight of temporal filter while lens is moving. Weight=1.0 disables temporal filter.

dynamicWeight.description: Weight of temporal filter while lens is moving. Weight=1.0 disables temporal filter.

staticWeight.description: Weight of temporal filter while lens is not moving. Weight=1.0 disables temporal filter.

dynamicWeight.description: Weight of temporal filter while lens is moving. Weight=1.0 disables temporal filter.

staticWeight.description: Weight of temporal filter while lens is not moving. Weight=1.0 disables temporal filter.

dynamicWeight.description: Weight of temporal filter while lens is moving. Weight=1.0 disables temporal filter.

staticWeight.description: Weight of temporal filter while lens is not moving. Weight=1.0 disables temporal filter.

enableGridOverlap.description: Enables PD statistics to be computed in overlapping grids.

confIntegralWidth.description: Tuning parameter for confidence level. Increasing this tuning increases confidence level.

biasVectorStrength.description: Strength of bias to be applied to disparity vector for the case of repeating patterns.

temporalFilterStaticWeight.description: Weight of temporal filter while lens is not moving. Weight=1.0 disables temporal filter.

temporalFilterDynamicWeight.description: Weight of temporal filter while lens is moving. Weight=1.0 disables temporal filter.

dynamicWeight.description: Weight of temporal filter while lens is moving. Weight=1.0 disables temporal filter.

staticWeight.description: Weight of temporal filter while lens is not moving. Weight=1.0 disables temporal filter.

dynamicWeight.description: Weight of temporal filter while lens is moving. Weight=1.0 disables temporal filter.

staticWeight.description: Weight of temporal filter while lens is not moving. Weight=1.0 disables temporal filter.

dynamicWeight.description: Weight of temporal filter while lens is moving. Weight=1.0 disables temporal filter.

staticWeight.description: Weight of temporal filter while lens is not moving. Weight=1.0 disables temporal filter.

enableGridOverlap.description: Enables PD statistics to be computed in overlapping grids.

confIntegralWidth.description: Tuning parameter for confidence level. Increasing this tuning increases confidence level.

enable.description: A flag for enabling adaptive k feature or not.

timeoutFrameCntThres.description: A timeout frame number. If frame counter meets the threshold as adaptive k is in state 1, it will return to state 0.

filterSize.description: Size of the median filter. The median filter process is utilized as estimating DCC value from adaptive k data history.

state0StableCntThres.description: Stable count threshold as adaptive k is in state 0. Before entering state 1, all adaptive k input stats should meet state-0-requirements for at least state0StableCntThres frames.

state1StableCntThres.description: Stable count threshold as adaptive k is in state 1. Before entering state 2, all adaptive k input stats should meet state-2-requirements for at least state1StableCntThres frames.

minimumLensPosDelta.description: Minimum number of lens position delta as estimating K value in state 2. If the lens position delta is less than the value, the K estimate will be abandoned.

state0ConfThres.description: Minimum confidence value before entering state 1 as adaptive k is in state 0.

state1ConfThres.description: Minimum confidence value before entering state 2 as adaptive k is in state 1.

state0PhaseDiffThres.description: Minimum phase difference value before entering state 1 as adaptive k is in state 0.

state1PhaseDiffThres.description: Minimum phase difference value before entering state 2 as adaptive k is in state 1.

tolNearTargetUpperBound.description: Upper bound ratio with respect to golden module K value as target is at near end (MACRO). If estimated K is within the bound, this means K value is valid for proper AF behavior.

tolNearTargetLowerBound.description: Lower bound ratio with respect to golden module K value as target is at near end (MACRO). If estimated K is within the bound, this means K value is valid for proper AF behavior.

tolFarTargetUpperBound.description: Upper bound ratio with respect to golden module K value as target is at far end (INFINITY). If estimated K is within the bound, this means K value is valid for proper AF behavior.

tolFarTargetLowerBound.description: Lower bound ratio with respect to golden module K value as target is at far end (INFINITY). If estimated K is within the bound, this means K value is valid for proper AF behavior.

processingMode.description: Specify the PD processing Mode, Dynamic/LOW/MED/HIGH is deprecate, use const_quality/cost instead

dynamicLevel.description: Tuning parameter for dynamic adjustment of vertical density at which PD is computed in focusing state

staticLevel.description: Tuning parameter for dynamic adjustment of vertical density at which PD is computed in monitor state

processingMode.description: Specify the PD processing Mode, Dynamic/LOW/MED/HIGH is deprecate, use const_quality/cost instead

dynamicLevel.description: Tuning parameter for dynamic adjustment of vertical density at which PD is computed in focusing state

staticLevel.description: Tuning parameter for dynamic adjustment of vertical density at which PD is computed in monitor state

staticLevel.description: Tuning parameter for dynamic adjustment of vertical density at which PD is computed in monitor state

staticLevel.description: Tuning parameter for dynamic adjustment of vertical density at which PD is computed in monitor state

staticLevel.description: Tuning parameter for dynamic adjustment of vertical density at which PD is computed in monitor state

processingMode.description: Specify the PD processing Mode, Dynamic/LOW/MED/HIGH is deprecate, use const_quality/cost instead

dynamicLevel.description: Tuning parameter for dynamic adjustment of vertical density at which PD is computed in focusing state

staticLevel.description: Tuning parameter for dynamic adjustment of vertical density at which PD is computed in monitor state

staticFrameCountThres.description: Frame count thres for static lens to trigger PD processing skip logic

maxFrameRate.description: Specify the PD processing frame rate when PD processing skip logic kick in, 30 means no skip.

enabldHardwarePDModule.description: A flag indicating hardware PD module is enabled or not.

enableOverlap.description: A flag indicating overlap in postprocess grid in enabled or not.

numOfHoriGrids.description: Number of horizontal grids for the postprocess grids (multiwindow)

numOfVertGrids.description: Number of vertical grids for the postprocess grids (multiwindow)

horiNumOfRGNInGridUnit.description: Number of horizontal HW RGN in the grid unit

vertNumOfRGNInGridUnit.description: Number of vertical HW RGN in the grid unit

horiRegionOffset.description: horizontal offset for the HWGrid configuration

vertRegionOffset.description: vertical offset for the HWGrid configuration

horiNumOfRegion.description: number of HWGRid in horizontal direction

vertNumOfRegion.description: number of HWGrid in vertical direction

ID.description: extension feature ID, defined in the algorithm code so please do not change
